rawMotor

public boolean rawMotor(int leftMode,
                        int leftSpeed,
                        int rightMode,
                        int rightSpeed,
                        int delay)
Deprecated. 
Adds a raw motor command to the macro. This allows direct control of the motors.

Parameters:
leftMode - Either RAW_MOTOR_FORWARD or RAW_MOTOR_REVERSE to control the mode of the left motor.
leftSpeed - A value between 0 to 255 for the power(speed) set to the left motor.
rightMode - Either RAW_MOTOR_FORWARD or RAW_MOTOR_REVERSE to control the mode of the right motor.
rightSpeed - A value between 0 to 255 for the power(speed) set to the right motor.
delay - A delay
Returns:
false if the paramaters are out of range or if there is not enough memory to add the command. true if the command was added.
